The pictures were published on March 15: 2021, in a Facebook post that has been shared more than 9,500 times.
The three photos show a short animal: a person's hand holding meat with white dots, and red meat in a yellow plastic bag with white dots on it.
The Facebook post: s Malaysian-language caption claims that the pictures depict a cross between a pig and a cow that has entered Malaysia from Thailand.
The expert: a veterinary professor at University Putra Malaysia, states that it is impossible to cross-breed cows and pigs due to their belonging to different animal families.
